note:
Alchemist, Lithomancer and devotee of goddess Hathor and the Eyes of Ra.

he/him cishet

In 2015 while in a trance state I made contact with a feminine spirit who in subsequent trances gave me the design of my Alchemical apparatus. I didn't know its purpose at the time but more trances followed and it was revealed that the apparatus was for divination and ritual communication.

My Grandad was also interested in Alchemy and I also study and re-create his work from 1930's notebooks.

name: Weird electric bass centered music-
